room_title: Escape room "The Mission" by Xcape Adventures in Dallas-Fort Worth
room_description: You and your team are spies who have successfully infiltrated the hideout of a known operative. An organization is attempting to steal the secret formula for pure energy to use as weaponry. You must work together to intercept the exchange and prevent the formula from falling into the wrong hands. Find and reprogram hidden bugs, decipher codes, and validate assets with your teammates. Work hard and work FAST! Can you successfully carry out the operation before time is up, or will your covers be blown?
